news.title: How AI trained on birds is surfacing underwater mysteries
Bringing ChatGPT to GenAI.mil
news.description: OpenAI for Government announces the deployment of a custom ChatGPT on GenAI.mil, bringing secure, safety-forward AI to U.S. defense teams.

news.title: Testing ads in ChatGPT
news.description: OpenAI begins testing ads in ChatGPT to support free access, with clear labeling, answer independence, strong privacy protections, and user control.

news.title: Making AI work for everyone, everywhere: our approach to localization
news.description: OpenAI shares its approach to AI localization, showing how globally shared frontier models can be adapted to local languages, laws, and cultures without compromising safety.

news.title: GPT-5 lowers the cost of cell-free protein synthesis
news.description: An autonomous lab combining OpenAI’s GPT-5 with Ginkgo Bioworks’ cloud automation cut cell-free protein synthesis costs by 40% through closed-loop experimentation.

news.title: Introducing Trusted Access for Cyber
news.description: OpenAI introduces Trusted Access for Cyber, a trust-based framework that expands access to frontier cyber capabilities while strengthening safeguards against misuse.

news.title: How AI tools can redefine universal design to increase accessibility
Introducing OpenAI Frontier
news.description: OpenAI Frontier is an enterprise platform for building, deploying, and managing AI agents with shared context, onboarding, permissions, and governance.

news.title: Introducing GPT-5.3-Codex
news.description: GPT-5.3-Codex is a Codex-native agent that pairs frontier coding performance with general reasoning to support long-horizon, real-world technical work.

news.title: GPT-5.3-Codex System Card
news.description: GPT‑5.3-Codex is the most capable agentic coding model to date, combining the frontier coding performance of GPT‑5.2-Codex with the reasoning and professional knowledge capabilities of GPT‑5.2.

news.title: Navigating health questions with ChatGPT
news.description: A family shares how ChatGPT helped them prepare for critical cancer treatment decisions for their son alongside expert guidance from his doctors.

news.title: ​Sequential Attention: Making AI models leaner and faster without sacrificing accuracy
Unlocking the Codex harness: how we built the App Server
news.description: Learn how to embed the Codex agent using the Codex App Server, a bidirectional JSON-RPC API powering streaming progress, tool use, approvals, and diffs.

news.title: VfL Wolfsburg turns ChatGPT into a club-wide capability
news.description: By focusing on people, not pilots, the Bundesliga club is scaling efficiency, creativity, and knowledge—without losing its football identity.

news.title: Collaborating on a nationwide randomized study of AI in real-world virtual care
